task.role: You are a Senior Security Engineer with expertise in authentication and secure coding. Implement Task 6 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Add OAuth2 authentication providers for Google and GitHub login
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Add oauth2 crate dependency 2. Create oauth.rs module with OAuth2 client configuration 3. Implement OAuth2 authorization flow handlers for Google and GitHub 4. Add callback endpoints: /auth/google/callback, /auth/github/callback 5. Store OAuth2 client credentials in environment variables 6. Link OAuth2 accounts to existing users or create new users 7. Generate JWT tokens after successful OAuth2 authentication

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-6): Implement OAuth2 integration (Google and GitHub)

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Integration tests with mock OAuth2 providers and manual testing with real OAuth2 flows
